resources.string:
DNA Relationship Reference is inspired by the efforts of the team that developed The Shared Cm Project and draws its data and general functionality from version 4.0 of the tool.

This tool was developed for Android independently by M. A. Van Praet. (20230829)

Thanks for using DNA Relationship Reference!
How to use DNA Relationship Reference

Enter either the match value in absolute Centimorgans or your shared relationship percentage. Select the unit you\'ve entered and about which you\'d like to find possible relationships.</br> Relationships are listed by probable match, showing the relative probable relationship percentage. Expand the percentage group to reveal the individual relationships and the relationship average.
